fields.name: signal_phase_num
fields.description: Each phase has one or more Movements associated with it.

fields.name: mvmt_id
fields.description: Foreign key. Either Movement_ID (for phases used by vehicles), or Link_id (for phases used by pedestrians) is required.

fields.name: link_id
fields.description: Foreign key. Either Movement_ID (for phases used by vehicles), or Link_id (for phases used by pedestrians) is required.

fields.name: protection
fields.description: Optional. Indicates whether the phase is protected, permitted, or right turn on red.

name: signal_phase_mvmt.schema.json
description: Associates Movements and pedestrian Links (e.g., crosswalks) with signal phases. A signal phase may be associated with several movements. A Movement may also run on more than one phase.
